annonstext:
At Minna Technologies, we’re on a mission to bring power to the modern consumer, through effortless subscription management. Founded in 2016, with partners such as Visa, Swedbank, and Danske Bank, we are currently one of Europe's fastest growing FinTechs. Our leading subscription management products currently reach 18.7 million users worldwide and help people to save time, money, and effort.

We are and develop world-class talents, trusting each other's knowledge and experience to achieve great things together. We are always eager to fulfill our purpose, and we take on risks, crash and burn - rather than being mediocre. In 2020, Business Insider recognised Minna as Personal Finance Management Disruptor and Sifted considers us to be a Top European FinTech. We are ready to scale, recently announcing a raise of €15.5m in Series B funding (https://minnatechnologies.com/2021/01/14/series-b/).

About the job
We are and develop world-class talents, trusting each other's knowledge and experience. For us the team is the most important and we try to help each other to achieve great things together. We are always eager to fulfil our purpose and we take on risks, crash and burn - rather than being mediocre.

You'll join an autonomous, cross-functional and agile team bringing our products to the next level. You'd contribute to quickly finding solutions to large projects within the team by leveraging your past experiences and your extensive technical knowledge. You'll have the opportunity to impact product decisions, organisation in the team as well as bring value to millions of users across Europe!

We are using Scala in all our backend systems together with Akka HTTP and MongoDB as our database. On top of this, we of course build our own libraries as well. In our frontend development we use Typescript with React. For infrastructure we use Kubernetes and are hosted on Google Cloud Platform. Given that we have cross functional, agile and autonomous teams we are going into Microservices architecture to allow our teams to set their own infrastructure without dependencies outside the team. We believe in radical focus, accountability and mandate!

What we are looking for
We're looking for one talented frontend developers with:

- A range from 3 up to 20+ years of experience working within frontend development
- You know and have worked with scaling up frontend services, taking initiatives to improve and simplify them
- Experience/knowledge of javascript languages/frameworks such as Typescript, React or Vue.js
- You keep up to date with trends and new technology within the Javascript ecosystem
- You've proven to deliver value quickly
- You are humble, service-minded, and a strong communicator
- You have worked with teams before and thrived in that environment
- You enjoy working in agile teams of 5-10 great talents

What we'll offer you
Our family consists of highly talented individuals from all over the world. What unites us is our enthusiasm for shaping the future of FinTech.

At Minna, we believe that autonomy and collaboration is more important than hierarchy. We value a caring and equal workplace where you are allowed to grow while being yourself.

Besides compensation and benefits there to empower all aspects of your life; we also offer you equity in Minna Technologies.

If you would like to learn more about our company, we encourage you to check out our Life at Minna Technologies (https://www.instagram.com/minnatechnologies/) Instagram page.

We are eager to get to know you!
